data.name: Dialog_CloseLabel
data.comment: ARIA label for the dialog close button

data.name: Popover_CloseLabel
data.comment: ARIA label for the popover close button

data.name: Combobox_ClearAllLabel
data.comment: ARIA label for the combobox clear button

data.name: Calendar_NextMonthLabel
data.comment: ARIA label for the calendar next month navigation button

data.name: Calendar_PreviousMonthLabel
data.comment: ARIA label for the calendar previous month navigation button

data.name: Calendar_GridInstructions
data.value: Use arrow keys to navigate dates, Enter or Space to select
data.comment: Screen reader instructions for the calendar grid

data.name: Calendar_DateSelectedAnnouncement
data.comment: Screen reader announcement when a date is selected. {0} is the formatted date.

data.name: DateField_YearLabel
data.comment: ARIA label for the year segment in the date field

data.name: DateField_MonthLabel
data.comment: ARIA label for the month segment in the date field

data.name: DateField_DayLabel
data.comment: ARIA label for the day segment in the date field

data.name: DateField_HourLabel
data.comment: ARIA label for the hour segment in the date field

data.name: DateField_MinuteLabel
data.comment: ARIA label for the minute segment in the date field

data.name: DateField_DayPeriodLabel
data.comment: ARIA label for the AM/PM segment in the date field
